description: NASA has successfully reconnected with the TRACERS spacecraft after a period of silence. The team is assessing onboard systems and working on recovery to resume science operations. While progress is being made, full restoration will take time, with updates to follow via NASA’s TRACERS blog.
title: NASA Restores Contact With TRACERS Spacecraft SV1 After Communication Loss

description: NASA’s James Webb Space Telescope has captured a rare protostar about ten times the Sun’s mass blasting twin jets nearly eight light-years long. The beams carve through the glowing Sharpless 2-284 nebula, offering astronomers a vivid glimpse into how massive stars form and shape their galactic environment.
title: James Webb Space Telescope Spots Rare Protostar Blasting Twin Jets Across Milky Way

description: Nintendo made a host of announcements at the Nintendo Direct showcase on Friday. The company announced a new Mario Tennis Game, a new Yoshi game, and confirmed the release date for Metroid Prime 4: Beyond.
title: Mario Tennis Fever, Super Mario Galaxy 1+2, Donkey Kong Bananza DLC: Major Announcements at Nintendo Direct

description: A groundbreaking study shows ions in solar flares can reach 108 million°F, about six times hotter than earlier estimates. The research explains decades-old mysteries in flare spectra and urges new “multi-temperature” models to better forecast space weather, protecting satellites, astronauts, and communications from hazardous solar storms.
title: Scientists Say Solar Flares Are Hotter Than Expected, Could Reach 108 Million Degrees

description: Artiste, a 2025 Telugu drama-thriller directed by Ratanrishi, explores crime and obsession through a dark and suspenseful narrative. Starring Santosh Kalwacherla and Krisheka Patel, the film received mixed reviews and is currently streaming on Prime Video after its theatrical release in March 2025.
title: Artiste OTT Release: This Is Where You Can Watch the Telugu-Language Crime Thriller

description: Borderlands 4 launched on September 12 and quickly rose to the top of the Stream top sellers chart. The game has reached a peak concurrent player count of over 2,00,000 on Steam. Borderlands 4 is available on PC, PS5, and Xbox Series S/X.
title: Borderlands 4 Becomes Series' Biggest Steam Launch Ever With Over 200,000 Concurrent Players

description: Cryptocurrency exchange KuCoin has partnered with golf legend Adam Scott, appointing him as its first global brand ambassador. The collaboration marks KuCoin’s debut in sports sponsorships and comes amid regulatory scrutiny worldwide. By associating with Scott, KuCoin aims to strengthen its global image of trust and integrity while joining other major crypto firms tapping into sports to expand their mainstream appeal.
title: KuCoin Taps Golfer Adam Scott as First Global Brand Ambassador

description: Meesha, a 2025 Malayalam thriller directed by Emcy Joseph, stars Tamil actor Kathir in his Malayalam debut. Set in a forest, the film explores betrayal, ego, and survival among friends. With an IMDb rating of 9.4, it premieres on Sun NXT and OTTplay Premium from September 12, 2025.
title: Meesha Is Now Streaming on Sun NXT: All About This Malayalam Survival Drama

description: Poco M7 Plus 5G will launch in a 4GB RAM option in India soon. It was initially launched in 6GB and 8GB RAM options. It features a 7,000mAh battery with support for 33W fast charging. It runs on a Snapdragon 6s Gen 3 SoC and has a 50-megapixel dual rear camera unit.
title: Poco M7 Plus 5G to Be Available in New 4GB RAM Variant in India on September 22

description: Realme’s new patent application showcases clip-style earbuds that deviate from the usual in-ear or stem-based designs, featuring a rounded shape with curved edges for a secure fit around the ear. The design appears focused on stability and comfort, ideal for workouts or outdoor use. Patent images also show possible speaker grilles, touch controls, and health-tracking sensors. While Realme’s audio lineup currently includes TWS Buds Air, Buds T-series, and Buds Wireless neckbands, the filing signals plans to explore beyond conventional formats.
title: Realme Could Be Working on Clip-Style Earbuds, Patent Application Shows

description: Apple has reportedly postponed the release of the iPhone Air in China. The company is said to be working with mainland authorities to resolve regulatory issues related to the eSIM requirement. It is currently up for pre-orders in several markets, including India. Sales will begin next week.
title: Apple Reportedly Delays iPhone Air Launch in China Amidst eSIM Compliance Hurdles

description: Google, OpenAI, Meta, and several other artificial intelligence (AI) companies are now facing an inquiry over how they handle safety and mitigate risks associated with their chatbots. The order was passed by the US Federal Trade Commission, primarily to understand the potentially negative impacts of this technology on children and teens.
title: Are AI Chatbots Safe for Your Kids? FTC Launches Probe Into OpenAI, Google, Meta, and Others

description: Nothing Ear 3 will be launched in India and other markets next week. Ahead of the official launch, the Carl Pei-led company posted a teaser video revealing the design of the earphones. It has a transparent design language with white ear tips.
title: Nothing Ear 3 Design Fully Revealed Along With Charging Case Ahead of Launch in India

description: Oppo Pad 5 is expected to launch alongside the Find X9 series, though no date has been confirmed. It may come in grey, purple, and silver shades, with RAM and storage options up to 16GB RAM and up to 512GB. The tablet could feature a MediaTek Dimensity 9400+ SoC, a 12.1-inch 3K+ LCD with a 144Hz refresh rate, and an 8-megapixel camera. It will likely house a 10,300mAh battery with 67W fast charging support and weigh around 579g.
title: Oppo Pad 5 With MediaTek Dimensity 9400+ SoC to Launch Alongside Find X9 Series, Tipster Claims

description: Realme P3 Lite 5G is confirmed to launch in India on Saturday. Ahead of its much-anticipated debut, Flipkart, the e-commerce platform, has listed the handset on its website to reveal the full list of specifications and features ahead of the launch. Recently, the pricing in India, colourways, storage options, and some specifications of the phone were revealed by the company.
title: Realme P3 Lite 5G Specifications Revealed Ahead of September 13 Launch in India

description: Real World Asset (RWA) tokens rose 11 percent this week as tokenised assets on-chain touched $29 billion (roughly Rs. 2,40,000 crore). The market cap of RWA tokens surged from $67 billion (approximately Rs. 5,50,000 crore) to $76 billion (approximately Rs. 6,30,000 crore), led by Chainlink, Avalanche, and Ondo Finance. BlackRock and JPMorgan further boosted market confidence.
title: RWA Tokens Surge 11 Percent as On-Chain Value Hits $29 Billion

description: The Bengal Files, directed and written by Vivek Agnihotri, was released theatrically and is expected to land somewhere in the middle of October on the OTT.
title: The Bengal Files OTT Release Date: Know When and Where to Watch it Online

description: Apple’s hypertension detection feature will reportedly launch next week on the Apple Watch Series 11 and Watch Ultra 3 following FDA clearance, and will also be available on Series 9, Series 10, and Watch Ultra 2 models. Available in 150 countries, including the US, Hong Kong, and the EU, the feature uses the Apple Watch’s optical heart sensor to monitor blood vessel responses over 30 days. Users showing signs of chronic hypertension or high blood pressure will receive alerts and be advised to consult a healthcare professional.
title: Apple Watch Hypertension Tracking Feature Receives FDA Approval, Coming Next Week: Report

description: Microsoft on Wednesday unveiled a new Copilot feature that enables native audio generation. Users can provide a script, and the AI will convert it into a voiceover with multiple style options. Unlike standard text-to-speech, the output is designed to sound more natural. The feature is powered by Microsoft’s in-house MAI-Voice-1 model.
title: Microsoft Introduces Native Audio Generation in Copilot With Multiple Expressive Voices

description: EA has detailed Battlefield 6's Battle Royale mode in a new announcement. The publisher also confirmed that player tests for the mode will begin this week. The tests will be open to players who signed up for Battlefield Labs.
title: EA Details Battlefield 6's Battle Royale Mode, Player Tests Announced for This Week

description: Customers can pre-order iPhone 17 models today, starting at 5:30 pm IST in India. The sale will begin on September 19. They will be available for pre-orders through Apple's online store, Amazon and Flipkart, and authorised Apple retail outlets. The company started taking pre-orders for the AirPods Pro 3, Watch Series 11, Watch Ultra 3, and Watch SE 3 on launch day, September 9.
title: iPhone 17 Series Available to Pre-Order in India Alongside New Apple Watch Models, AirPods Pro 3

description: OpenAI’s path towards acquiring more investors or going public has been cleared by Microsoft. The two entities signed a non-binding memorandum of understanding (MoU) on Thursday and called it the next phase of their partnership. This MoU also gives the San Francisco-based AI firm to now formalise the conversion of its for-profit arm into a PBC.
title: Is OpenAI About to Go Public? New Non-Binding Microsoft Deal Signals IPO Plans

description: Sony Xperia 10 VII has been unveiled in select markets, the company announced on Friday. The new Sony phone packs a 5,000mAh battery and is powered by a Snapdragon 6-series chip, paired with 8GB of RAM and 128GB of onboard storage, with the option to expand the storage by 2TB via a microSD card.
title: Sony Xperia 10 VII Launched With 5,000mAh Battery, Snapdragon Chipset: Price, Specifications

description: Bitcoin rallied to $115,644 (roughly Rs. 1.02 crore), boosted by ETF inflows of $928 million (roughly Rs. 7,970 crore) and softer U.S. inflation data. Ethereum climbed near $4,552 (roughly Rs. 4.01 lakh), while altcoins like Solana at $239 (roughly Rs. 21,100) and Dogecoin at $0.26 (roughly Rs. 23) posted strong gains. Market optimism has strengthened ahead of expected U.S. Fed rate cuts, setting a bullish tone for crypto traders going into the weekend.
title: Bitcoin Rally Pushes Price to $115,500 as Softer Inflation, ETF Inflows Boost Market

description: Google Pixel 10 Pro XL was launched last month and a teardown video of the smartphone highlights design choices by Google. The latest teardown video of the Pixel 10 Pro XL by JerryRigEverything reveals that the design allows for a much cleaner and safer removal of the old battery and a straightforward installation of a new one.
title: Google Pixel 10 Pro XL Teardown Video Hints at a Repair-Friendly Design, Easily Removable Battery

description: Motorola is reportedly developing the Moto G (2026) and Moto G Play (2026). Leaks suggest the Moto G will have a 50-megapixel main camera with Macro Vision, a 32-megapixel front camera, a 5,200 mAh battery with 30W charging, and MediaTek Dimensity 6300 with 128GB storage. The Moto G Play may have lower storage, weaker cameras, and 18W charging. The phones are tipped to feature almost identical designs.
title: Moto G (2026), Moto G Play (2026) Design Renders and Key Features Leaked

description: CD Projekt Red is rolling out a new update for Cyberpunk 2077. Patch 2.31 adds improvements to the AutoDrive feature and photo mode in the game, along with a host of fixes. The new patch is available on PC, PS5, Xbox Series S/X, Mac, Nintendo Switch 2.
title: Cyberpunk 2077 Gets Patch 2.31, Featuring Improvements to AutoDrive, Photo Mode and More

description: Google is reportedly extending Gemini’s split-screen feature to standard Android smartphones. Previously limited to tablets and foldable devices, the tool lets users drag the assistant’s prompt bar into split view for quicker access. The update would bring the multitasking capability to regular candybar-style phones, expanding its availability beyond larger-screen devices.
title: Gemini Is Reportedly Expanding Its Split-Screen Switch Feature to Candybar Android Phones

description: Moto Pad 60 Neo has been launched in India, the company announced on Friday. The new Motorola tablet sports an 11-inch display with 2.5K resolution and a 90Hz refresh rate. It packs a 7,040mAh battery and is powered by a MediaTek Dimensity chipset. It will go on sale at the end of September via an e-commerce platform.
title: Moto Pad 60 Neo Launched in India With 7,040mAh Battery, 2.5K 11-Inch Display: Price, Features

description: Samsung Galaxy Buds 3 FE has been launched in India with 11mm drivers, ANC with Ambient Sound, and Crystal Clear Call technology backed by three microphones. They deliver 360 Audio, touch controls, multi-device connectivity, and Bluetooth 5.4 with SSC, AAC, and SBC codecs. The earbuds support AI voice controls and Galaxy AI Interpreter, and enable hands-free Gemini access. They are said to provide up to 8.5 hours of playback and up to 30 hours with the case.
title: Samsung Galaxy Buds 3 FE Launched in India With ANC, Galaxy AI Features: Price, Specifications

description: Flipkart's Big Billion Days Sale 2025 will begin on September 23, and during the sale event, the e-commerce platform will offer various electronics and smart home appliances at a discounted price. Customers will also be able to take advantage of cashback offers and exchange bonuses. Ahead of its commencement, a leaked deal suggests that the Samsung Galaxy S24 Ultra handset could be available at an effective price of Rs. 59,990 in the sale. This is expected to include sale discounts and bank offers.
title: Samsung Galaxy S24 Ultra Under Rs. 60,000? Flipkart's Big Billion Days Sale Deal Leaks

description: Samsung Galaxy Tab S10 Lite was launched by the South Korean tech giant last month, and the tablet is now available to purchase in India. The tablets were launched at the company’s Galaxy launch event, alongside the Galaxy Tab S11 and the Galaxy Tab S11 Ultra, its new flagship tablets. The tech firm also launched two new ‘Fan Edition’ devices, including the Galaxy S25 FE 5G and the Galaxy Buds 3 FE, during the event.
title: Samsung Galaxy Tab S10 Lite Launched in India With Exynos 1380 SoC: Price, Specifications

description: Apple issued new spyware threat alerts to users on September 3, according to France's Computer Emergency Response Team (CERT-FR). The iPhone maker sent out notifications earlier this year in March, April, and June. Apple’s spyware threat notifications highlight highly sophisticated attacks. To reduce the risk of threats, users are advised to follow a few practices.
title: Apple Issues Spyware Threat Notifications to Users in France

description: Gmail is enhancing its order-tracking with a new Purchases tab, which organises order-related emails, delivery updates, and “Arriving soon” cards for upcoming shipments. Found under All labels, it also continues showing summary cards in emails and the inbox. The feature is rolling out globally for personal accounts on Android, iOS, and the web. Additionally, the Promotions tab is gaining a “Most relevant” filter prioritising brands users engage with most, plus nudges to highlight timely offers, coming to mobile in the weeks ahead.
title: Gmail Adds Purchases Tab to Simplify Online Order Tracking Ahead of Festive Sale Season

description: The Vivo X300 series is expected to include the standard Vivo X300 and the Vivo X300 Pro. Expected to succeed last year’s Vivo X200 series, which debuted in October 2024, a tipster has now revealed the possible launch date of the upcoming smartphone lineup. An executive of the Chinese smartphone maker recently confirmed several specifications of both Vivo X300 series phones.
title: Vivo X300 Series Launch Date, Camera Specifications Leaked

description: WhatsApp for Android is testing a threaded replies feature to improve group chat organisation, according to a feature tracker. The tool opens a separate window showing all replies to a single message. Currently limited to select beta testers, the feature may expand soon. Notably, the threaded icon appears only when a message gets multiple replies.
title: WhatsApp for Android Testing Message Threads for Easier Group Chat Organisation

description: Nothing on Thursday revealed the design of its upcoming Ear 3 earbuds, showcasing the full case and earbuds after earlier teasers. Launching on September 18, the TWS model features a metallic case, replacing the Ear 2’s transparent frame. The design also introduces a new Talk button, though its purpose remains undisclosed.
title: Nothing Ear 3 First Look Is Here, Design Reveals Mysterious Talk Button

description: Flipkart Big Billion Days Sale 2025 is only a couple of weeks away. Ahead of its commencement, the e-commerce platform has revealed the deal prices on different iPhone models. After teasing the discounted prices of iPhone 16 Pro Max, iPhone 16 Pro, and iPhone 14, the company has now also revealed the exact price at which last year’s standard iPhone 16 will be available to customers.
title: Flipkart Big Billion Days Sale to Offer iPhone 16 at an Unbelievable Price

description: Directed by Mohit Suri, Saiyaara is now streaming on Netflix. The movie is a musical romance drama that features Ahaan Panday and Aneet Padda in the lead roles. This musical romance drama follows Krish Kapoor (played by Ahaan Panday), a temperamental musician, who falls for the poetry of Vaani Batra (Aneet Padda).
title: Saiyaara Is Now Streaming on Netflix: All You Need to Know About The Ahaan Pandey, Aneet Padda Starrer
